title: Camera app crashing
content:
Hi,

I just wanted to know if you guys have had any issues as of today for the camera app. It was working fine for me until today. I've done everything that I can do in hopes of fixing my issue. For me, it keeps crashing even after restarting the phone, un-installing and re-install ung the updates, and even seeing if it comes up on other apps. Nothing worked.

I've had no issues with this phone since I've had it and I love it. I really don't want to get a new phone anytime soon unless I really have to. My phone by the way is a Pixel 2 XL 128gb.

Please let me know if there is anything else you need from me.

Thank you for your time!
